About This Property
Don't miss this spacious 1 bed 1 bath condo unit on the garden level of a well maintained building. This dog friendly condominium unit features a full kitchen with refrigerator, electric stove/ oven, and plenty of cabinets leading out to a spacious living area, a nicely tiled bathroom with tub, a large bedroom, and access to swimming pool on site. Conveniently located in Chestnut Hill... Close to VFW Parkway, many shops, restaurants/ bars, schools/ universities, public transportation, medical facilities, golf courses, Millennium Park, and much more.
